description: Screenshot feature which is all I'm using this for works very well. Looks nice too.

I can generate max 14 characters of information in a QR code?

No, thank you. Why would you limit your app like that anyway?

It reads and generates qr codes smoothly. but in screenshot, the background of qrcode should be white. The character limitation increases by modifying Version.

If it read from webcam, it would be greate.

Super simple QR code generator, with classy rounded elements. Handles QR density versions 1-40 (up to 2953 characters with low error correction or 1273 characters with high error correction). Reader works well enough, it has trouble with super stylized QR codes, but otherwise does a fine job.
summary: Does what is says on the tin

description: On Fedora Workstation 39, it only pops up a white window frame. Alt+F4 successfully closes it.
It seems that photos of a QR code do not work. Also this project does not support scanning with the camera.
summary: Does not work on real photos

description: It worked for me and there is no 14 char limitation, there is an option to increase density. A very good app and flying 5 stars. Thank you.
Works better for screenshot than other apps in a list (Fedora 39 WS), no need to save image to device.
A veces crashea al cerrarse, pero si genera los códigos QR y permite guardarlos.
